description: The SPEAKS- student dataset contains individual level information from a sample of college students on GLS funded campuses. These data include student demographics, the students' exposure to suicide prevention on their campus, their attitudes about suicide and seeking help, their self-efficacy to perform suicide-prevention related behaviors, their knowledge of suicide myths, facts, and their campus resources, and their connectedness and help-seeking behaviors.

distribution.title: Suicide Prevention Exposure, Awareness, and Knowledge Survey (SPEAKS) - Student

publisher.name: Substance Abuse & Mental Health Services Administration

title: Suicide Prevention Exposure, Awareness, and Knowledge Survey (SPEAKS) - Student
